trans-unit.source: Creating an Oracle WebLogic Server 12c and Oracle Database 12c virtual machine in Azure
trans-unit.target: Creating an Oracle WebLogic Server 12c and Oracle Database 12c virtual machine in Azure

trans-unit.source: Step through an example of creating an Oracle WebLogic Server 12c and Oracle Database 12c image running on Windows Server 2012 in Microsoft Azure.
trans-unit.target: Step through an example of creating an Oracle WebLogic Server 12c and Oracle Database 12c image running on Windows Server 2012 in Microsoft Azure.

trans-unit.source: Create an Oracle WebLogic Server 12c and Oracle Database 12c virtual machine in Azure
trans-unit.target: Create an Oracle WebLogic Server 12c and Oracle Database 12c virtual machine in Azure

trans-unit.source: This article shows how to create a virtual machine based on a Microsoft-provided Oracle WebLogic Server 12c and Oracle Database 12c image running on Windows Server 2012 in Azure.
trans-unit.target: This article shows how to create a virtual machine based on a Microsoft-provided Oracle WebLogic Server 12c and Oracle Database 12c image running on Windows Server 2012 in Azure.

trans-unit.source: To create an Oracle WebLogic Server 12c and Oracle Database 12c virtual machine in Azure
trans-unit.target: To create an Oracle WebLogic Server 12c and Oracle Database 12c virtual machine in Azure

trans-unit.source: Sign in to the [Azure portal](https://ms.portal.azure.com/).
trans-unit.target: Sign in to the [Azure portal](https://ms.portal.azure.com/).

trans-unit.source: Click the **Marketplace**, click **Compute**, and then type **Oracle** into the search box.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Marketplace**, click **Compute**, and then type **Oracle** into the search box.

trans-unit.source: Select the **Oracle Database 12c and WebLogic Server 12c Standard Edition on Windows Server 2012** or **Oracle Database 12c and WebLogic Server 12c Enterprise Edition on Windows Server 2012** image.
trans-unit.target: Select the **Oracle Database 12c and WebLogic Server 12c Standard Edition on Windows Server 2012** or **Oracle Database 12c and WebLogic Server 12c Enterprise Edition on Windows Server 2012** image.

trans-unit.source: Review the information about this image (such as minimum recommended size), and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: Review the information about this image (such as minimum recommended size), and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: Specify a **Host Name** for the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: Specify a **Host Name** for the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: Specify a **User Name** for the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: Specify a **User Name** for the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: Note that this user name is for remotely signing in to the virtual machine; this is not the Oracle database user name.
trans-unit.target: Note that this user name is for remotely signing in to the virtual machine; this is not the Oracle database user name.

trans-unit.source: Specify and confirm a password for the virtual machine, or provide a Secure Shell (SSH) public key.
trans-unit.target: Specify and confirm a password for the virtual machine, or provide a Secure Shell (SSH) public key.

trans-unit.source: Choose a **Pricing Tier**.
trans-unit.target: Choose a **Pricing Tier**.

trans-unit.source: Note that the recommended pricing tiers are displayed by default.
trans-unit.target: Note that the recommended pricing tiers are displayed by default.

trans-unit.source: To see all configuration options, click **View all** on the top right.
trans-unit.target: To see all configuration options, click **View all** on the top right.

trans-unit.source: Set the optional configurations as needed (see [About Azure virtual machine configuration settings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn763935.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Set the optional configurations as needed (see [About Azure virtual machine configuration settings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn763935.aspx).

trans-unit.source: Follow these considerations:
trans-unit.target: Follow these considerations:

trans-unit.source: a.
trans-unit.target: a.

trans-unit.source: Leave **Storage Account** as-is to create a new storage account with the virtual machine name.
trans-unit.target: Leave **Storage Account** as-is to create a new storage account with the virtual machine name.

trans-unit.source: b.
trans-unit.target: b.

trans-unit.source: Leave **Availability Set** as **Not Configured**.
trans-unit.target: Leave **Availability Set** as **Not Configured**.

trans-unit.source: c.
trans-unit.target: c.

trans-unit.source: Do not add any endpoints at this time.
trans-unit.target: Do not add any endpoints at this time.

trans-unit.source: Choose or create a resource group.
trans-unit.target: Choose or create a resource group.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using the Azure Preview Portal to manage your Azure resources](resource-group-portal.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Using the Azure Preview Portal to manage your Azure resources](resource-group-portal.md).

trans-unit.source: Choose a **Subscription**.
trans-unit.target: Choose a **Subscription**.

trans-unit.source: Choose a **Location**.
trans-unit.target: Choose a **Location**.

trans-unit.source: To create your database hosted in this virtual machine
trans-unit.target: To create your database hosted in this virtual machine

trans-unit.source: Follow the instructions in [Create an Oracle Database 12c virtual machine in Azure](virtual-machines-creating-oracle-database-virtual-machine.md), beginning with the **To create your database using the Oracle Database 12c virtual machine in Azure** section.
trans-unit.target: Follow the instructions in [Create an Oracle Database 12c virtual machine in Azure](virtual-machines-creating-oracle-database-virtual-machine.md), beginning with the **To create your database using the Oracle Database 12c virtual machine in Azure** section.

trans-unit.source: To configure your Oracle WebLogic Server 12c hosted in this virtual machine
trans-unit.target: To configure your Oracle WebLogic Server 12c hosted in this virtual machine

trans-unit.source: Follow the instructions in [Create an Oracle WebLogic Server 12c virtual machine in Azure](virtual-machines-creating-oracle-webLogic-server-12c-virtual-machine.md), beginning with the **To configure your Oracle WebLogic Server 12c virtual machine in Azure** section.
trans-unit.target: Follow the instructions in [Create an Oracle WebLogic Server 12c virtual machine in Azure](virtual-machines-creating-oracle-webLogic-server-12c-virtual-machine.md), beginning with the **To configure your Oracle WebLogic Server 12c virtual machine in Azure** section.

trans-unit.source: If you want to set up a WebLogic Server cluster, also see [Create an Oracle WebLogic Server 12c cluster in Azure](virtual-machines-creating-oracle-webLogic-server-12c-cluster.md).
trans-unit.target: If you want to set up a WebLogic Server cluster, also see [Create an Oracle WebLogic Server 12c cluster in Azure](virtual-machines-creating-oracle-webLogic-server-12c-cluster.md).
